This is a baae reflectivity image and is updated every 5 minutes.</idAbs> <searchKeys> <keyword>weater</keyword> <keyword>radar</keyword> <keyword>doppler</keyword> </searchKeys> <idPurp>CONUS Radar</idPurp> <idCredit>National Weather Service</idCredit> <resConst> <Consts> <useLimit/> </Consts> </resConst> <idCitation> <resTitle>RIDGERadar</resTitle> </idCitation> </dataIdInfo> <Binary> <Thumbnail> <Data EsriPropertyType="PictureX"></Data> </Thumbnail> </Binary> </metadata>
